stickman._stickmanXComment: the x position of stickman should be a positive double, it is the initial x position of the stickman
stickman._stickmanYComment: the initial y position of stickman will always be on the current level's floor
stickman._stickmanSizeComment: size of stickman is either normal, or large

_cloudComment: at least one cloud config should be given, in the game loop, the set of clouds will randomly be re-generated and placed on the game screen after a specified time period

cloud._cloudVelocityComment: every cloud specified should have a constant velocity, velocity could be negative or positive

level._levelHeight: level dimensions should be positive doubles

_platformComment: the number of items in the arrays represent the number of platforms to be added

platform._movementComment: platform movement could be either none, vertical, or horizontal

_enemyComment: enemy's y position is on the level's ground by default

enemy._enemyVelocityComment: positive velocity means the enemy's first movement will be towards the right, and vice vera for negative velocity

_mushroomComment: mushroom block can be removed if you don't want hero to be able to shoot at all
_mushroomPositionComment: if no x and y position were given, the default position will be at the lower left corner of the level
_flagComment: a flag configuration block should be specified, x and y should be positive doubles
_grassBlockComment: all grass blocks will be placed on the floor level, x represents the x position on the floor, grass blocks can't move
